content: *nothing fancy here just stripes * this is a basic pattern for cuff-down striped socks the socks feature a french heel and a star toe **size** s-m-l **yarn** canon hand dyes lewis mcn twist sock 80% merino 10% cashmere 10% nylon 361 m / 100 g or other fingering weight yarn 2 colors for striping the required yardage depends on the length of the foot **needles** us 2 2 5 mm - 40 / 100 cm circular needle for magic loop or dpns adjust needle size if necessary to obtain the right gauge **gauge** 15 sts x 21 rnds = 2x2 / 5x5 cm in stockinette stitch worked in the round after blocking **other** 6 stitch markers tapestry needle
